reviewText: I had me hooked, but the ending is very sad. I thought the father would come home and everything would end well.

not for everyone! i couldn't stop watching this movie, which is not even in the IMDB database! i kept reminding myself this movie came out in 1970, not the best of times in Poland. incredibly written, directed as few directors could. i likened it to 1950's Roberto Rossellini, with a 1950s Frederico Fellini flavor! wow! if you do view this, stick with it, the ending is more than worth it!
